decisions.description: Check if Billing Account Number is null, so the record is a new record, otherwise it should be an update record
decisions.name: Is_New_Record
decisions.label: Is New Record

Flow.description: Billing Account creation error message is sent to the case owner and if an apex error occured, the case owner will be notified
Flow.label: Voice Flow - Billing Account

recordLookups.description: Get all the billing accounts for the related account. So they can be listed or use it for choice
recordLookups.name: Get_Billing_Accounts
recordLookups.label: Get Billing Accounts

recordUpdates.description: The same BillingAccount record is being used here to update. If the record has the id, then the record will be updated
recordUpdates.name: Update_a_Billing_Account
recordUpdates.label: Update a Billing Account

fields.name: BillingAccountHelpText
fields.fieldText:
{!$Label.VTPX_BILLING_TITLE}

{!$Label.VTPX_BILLING_TEXT}

{!$Label.VTPX_BILLING_RADIO}

fields.name: Invoice_Name
fields.helpText: The invoicing name will usually be your company name and will be placed in the top of your invoice

fields.name: Billing_Att
fields.helpText: The Att. field gives you the opportunity to specify a department name, store number or similar. This will make it easier to differentiate between several invoices. The Att. field can also be used to specify a special person in the company who should receive the invoice.

textTemplates.name: ErrorEmailBody
textTemplates.text:
Hi {!CaseOwnerName},


The following case {!CaseNumber} throws an error when creating a Billing Account and the customer needs your help.


Thank you

textTemplates.name: ErrorMessageToUser
textTemplates.text: An error has occured. Please contact your case owner with the following case number {!InputCase.CaseNumber}

textTemplates.name: TitleTemplate
